title: What are the best smartphones under 70000 rupees? - Quora

response.answer_text: Samsung Galaxy S20. ₹ 66,999 onwards. Buy Compare. ...Apple iPhone 11. 128GB. ₹ 69,900 onwards. ...Apple iPhone 11. 64GB. ₹ 64,900 onwards. ...realme X50 Pro 5G. 12GB RAM, 256GB. ₹ 44,999 onwards. ...iQOO 3 5G. ₹ 44,990 onwards. ...realme X50 Pro 5G. 8GB RAM, 128GB. ...OnePlus 7T Pro McLaren Edition. ₹ 58,999 onwards. ...Asus ROG Phone II. 12GB RAM, 512GB.

Well you can buy one plus,one plus pro ,etc as others suggest you but if can spend around 70k Then you have to try Asus Rog phone but beware please purchase cover for that phone. Or you can try black Shark 2 Note :- These phones are performance centric phones
